name: Eclipse (itch) (Subject194)
description:
This game was made within 4 days with the design challenge of creating a game for a classic arcade cabinet and its controls. Please be aware that some of the features unfortunately were never fully implemented and that the game was made to be played on an arcade cabinet.

As a result, the games control screen only has the arcade cabinet controls. The game is ready to play on cabinet controls, and the PC controls can be found below. Pressing the buttons to add in player one or two starts the game. Pressing either 1 or 2 on the keyboard starts the game.

Player 1 Controls:

Arrow Keys to move

Left Ctrl to shoot

Left Alt to create reflector walls

X to upgrade

Z to gain shield

Player 2 Controls on PC were for testing, so they aren't complete.

RDFG to move

A to shoot
